de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.unionfind

Interface UnionFind

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightedQuickUnionRangeDBIDs, WeightedQuickUnionStaticDBIDs

    public interface UnionFind
    Union-find implementations in ELKI, for DBID objects.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      Find the component ID of an element.

        q - Second element
